trans-unit.source: Defines a collection that stores <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Definiert eine Auflistung, die <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />-Objekte speichert.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />-Klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />-Klasse.

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> objects with which to initialize the new object.
trans-unit.target: Das Array von <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />-Objekten, mit denen das neue Objekt initialisiert werden soll.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class from an array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />-Klasse aus einem Array von <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />-Objekten.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> with which to initialize the new object.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, mit der das neue Objekt initialisiert werden soll.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> class from another <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />-Klasse aus einer anderen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to add to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Das <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />, das zum aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> hinzugefügt werden soll.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> with the specified value to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Fügt ein <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> mit dem angegebenen Wert zum aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> hinzu.

trans-unit.source: The index into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> at which the new <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> was inserted.
trans-unit.target: Der Index im aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, bei dem das neue <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> eingefügt wurde.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of an array of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Kopiert die Elemente eines Arrays vom Typ <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> in die aktuelle <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The array of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> containing the objects to add to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Das Array vom Typ <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> mit den Objekten, die zur aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> hinzugefügt werden.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of an array of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to the end of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Kopiert die Elemente eines Arrays vom Typ <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> an das Ende des aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Der <paramref name="value" />-Parameter ist <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> containing the objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> mit den Objekten, die der Auflistung hinzugefügt werden sollen.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> to the end of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Kopiert die Elemente der angegebenen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> an das Ende der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Der <paramref name="value" />-Parameter ist <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: Die zu suchende <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.
trans-unit.target: Ruft einen Wert ab, der angibt, ob die aktuelle <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> das angegebene <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> enthält.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> is contained in this collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, wenn das <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> in dieser Auflistung enthalten ist, andernfalls <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the values copied from <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Das eindimensionale <see cref="T:System.Array" />, das das Ziel der aus der <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> kopierten Werte ist.

trans-unit.source: The index into <c>array</c> to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: Der Index im <c>array</c>, an dem der Kopiervorgang beginnen soll.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> values in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> instance at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Kopiert die <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />-Werte in der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> an den angegebenen Index in einer eindimensionalen <see cref="T:System.Array" />-Instanz.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="array" /> parameter is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: Der <paramref name="array" />-Parameter ist mehrdimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - oder -

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> is greater than the available space between <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> and the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: Die Anzahl der Elemente in der <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> ist größer als der verfügbare Platz zwischen <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> und dem Ende von <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="array" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Der <paramref name="array" />-Parameter ist <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="arrayIndex" /> parameter is less than the <paramref name="array" /> parameter's lower bound.
trans-unit.target: Der <paramref name="arrayIndex" />-Parameter ist kleiner als die Untergrenze des <paramref name="array" />-Parameters.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Gibt einen Enumerator zurück, der die <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> durchlaufen kann.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator of the subelements of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> you can use to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ein Enumerator der Unterelemente von <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, den Sie zum Durchlaufen der Auflistung verwenden können.

trans-unit.source: Builds a hash value based on all values contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Erstellt einen Hashwert auf Grundlage aller Werte in der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A hash value based on all values contained in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ein Hashwert auf Grundlage aller Werte in der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: Die zu suchende <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Gibt den Index des angegebenen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> in der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> zurück.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specified by the <paramref name="value" /> parameter in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Der Index des durch den <paramref name="value" />-Parameter angegebenen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> in <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />, sofern gefunden, andernfalls -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Der nullbasierte Index, in den <c>value</c> eingefügt werden soll.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Der einzufügende <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Fügt ein <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> am angegebenen Index in die <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> ein.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the entry to locate in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Der nullbasierte Index des Eintrags, der in der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> gesucht werden soll.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the entry at the specified index of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den Eintrag am angegebenen Index der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> ab, oder legt ihn fest.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> at the specified index of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Das <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> am angegebenen Index der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Der <paramref name="index" />-Parameter liegt außerhalb des gültigen Bereichs von Indizes für die Auflistung.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> to remove from the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Das <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" />, das aus der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" /> entfernt werden soll.

trans-unit.source: Removes a specific <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> from the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Entfernt ein bestimmtes <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> aus der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> specified by the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not found in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Das vom <paramref name="value" />-Parameter angegebene <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> befindet sich nicht in der aktuellen <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection" />.
